associatedefaultview.name: AssociateDefaultView
associatedefaultview.description: Grants permission to set the specified view as the default for this AWS Region in this AWS account

batchgetview.name: BatchGetView
batchgetview.description: Grants permission to retrieve details about views that you specify by a list of ARNs

createindex.name: CreateIndex
createindex.description: Grants permission to turn on Resource Explorer in the AWS Region in which you called this operation by creating an index

createmanagedview.name: CreateManagedView
createmanagedview.description: Grants permission to create managed view

createview.name: CreateView
createview.description: Grants permission to create a view that users can query

deleteindex.name: DeleteIndex
deleteindex.description: Grants permission to turn off Resource Explorer in the specified AWS Region by deleting the index

deleteresourcepolicy.name: DeleteResourcePolicy
deleteresourcepolicy.description: Grants permission to delete the specified view's resource policy

deleteview.name: DeleteView
deleteview.description: Grants permission to delete a view

disassociatedefaultview.name: DisassociateDefaultView
disassociatedefaultview.description: Grants permission to remove the default view for the AWS Region in which you call this operation

getaccountlevelserviceconfiguration.name: GetAccountLevelServiceConfiguration
getaccountlevelserviceconfiguration.description: Grants permission to Resource Explorer to access account level data within your AWS Organization

getdefaultview.name: GetDefaultView
getdefaultview.description: Grants permission to retrieve the Amazon resource name (ARN) of the view that is the default for the AWS Region in which you call this operation

getindex.name: GetIndex
getindex.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about the index in the AWS Region in which you call this operation

getmanagedview.name: GetManagedView
getmanagedview.description: Grants permission to get managed view

getresourcepolicy.name: GetResourcePolicy
getresourcepolicy.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about the specified view's resource policy

getview.name: GetView
getview.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about the specified view

listindexes.name: ListIndexes
listindexes.description: Grants permission to list the indexes in all AWS Regions

listindexesformembers.name: ListIndexesForMembers
listindexesformembers.description: Grants permission to list the organization member account's indexes in all AWS Regions

listmanagedviews.name: ListManagedViews
listmanagedviews.description: Grants permission to list managed views

listsupportedresourcetypes.name: ListSupportedResourceTypes
listsupportedresourcetypes.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of all resource types currently supported by Resource Explorer

listtagsforresource.name: ListTagsForResource
listtagsforresource.description: Grants permission to list the tags that are attached to the specified resource

listviews.name: ListViews
listviews.description: Grants permission to list the Amazon resource names (ARNs) of all of the views available in the AWS Region in which you call this operation

putresourcepolicy.name: PutResourcePolicy
putresourcepolicy.description: Grants permission to update the specified view's resource policy

search.name: Search
search.description: Grants permission to search for resources and display details about all resources that match the specified criteria

tagresource.name: TagResource
tagresource.description: Grants permission to add one or more tag key and value pairs to the specified resource

untagresource.name: UntagResource
untagresource.description: Grants permission to remove one or more tag key and value pairs from the specified resource

updateindextype.name: UpdateIndexType
updateindextype.description: Grants permission to change the type of the index from LOCAL to AGGREGATOR or back

updateview.name: UpdateView
updateview.description: Grants permission to modify some of the details of a view
